== Asus Eee 1005P ==

** Contact: <nowiki>[[moteprime]]</nowiki>
** Make: Asus
** Brand: Eee PC
** Model: Eee 1005P
** Website: http://www.asus.com/

=== Lucid Lynx ===

Test run on Live session from 1 Gb USB flash drive. 

=== Current Issues ===
The wireless nic works on ndiswrapper.

The screen brightness is very low, and control does not work properly It changes at what looks like random, and can't be set bright enough to see properly.

Multitouch on touchpad does not work.
